-Whether-Weather-

A web app showing todays and upcoming weather.

Getting Started

Install Eleventy

npm install -g @11ty/eleventy

Run Eleventy

eleventy --serve

Now navigate to http://localhost:8080 to see your site.

Hot reloading is enabled, so any changes you make to your files will be reflected in the browser.

Technologies

  • Eleventy
  • Bulma Overcast icons created by Ubaid El-Ahyar Alyafizi - Flaticon Sun icons created by DinosoftLabs - Flaticon Rain icons created by tulpahn - Flaticon
